general.gigTitle: develop elearning wordpress lms website using learndash lms

sellerCard.oneLiner: FullStack WordPress LMS Developer with Over 6 Years of Experience
sellerCard.description:
Hi, this is CEO of YottaSol. I'm a Software Engineer with over 7+ years of experience in designing and development of LMS, E-Learning, Membership, Community, E-commerce & Wordpress websites. I work closely with clients to ensure their goals are met on time and without issue.

I have great experience in developing and customizing different mobile-friendly websites by using WordPress, Wix, Thinkfic, PHP, Laravel and custom websites. I work with honor and integrity. I guarantee quality work and lifetime support. Step Forward for the fulfillment of your dreams.

description.content:
Are you looking for Learning management services?  If yes, contact me now if you need any service or have any query about LMS Website. I will help you with anything related to LMS websites, For example payment integration and other Lms Systems Configurations like Masterstudy, Tutor lms, Learndash, Buddyboss, Eduma and wplms.


My Services;

  • LMS Integration , Attractive Design
  • eLearning LMS site creation from scratch with LearnDash
  • Premium Theme and plugin installation
  • Advanced Quizzes , Lesson Timers ,Grade Book 
  • Notification, Message & E-mails
  • Courses, flows, and topics setup
  • Configure course points, certificates, and badges
  • Secure SSL Encrypted Payment Gateway
  • WooCommerce/Payment integration
  • Sales Report/And Many More


Reasons To Choose Me:

  • 5+ years of experience in web design & development
  • Worked with fortune 1200+ client
  • 1200+ successfully finished projects
  • 24/7 Availability


I also have experience in following LMS applications.


Learndash | Learnpress | Tutor LMS | WPLMS | WordPress LMS | Masterstudy | LMS | Online Courses Website | Elementor Pro | Paid Membership Pro | Memberpress | Membership | Buddypress | Buddyboss | Elearning LMS | Learning Management System | Yoast Seo

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I see more samples of your work ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, Please message me. I will provide you my Portfolio.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support after order completed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you can tell me when you want any support, I will provide.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I'm ready to get started! Which info you will need from me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need the login details of your domain and hosting provider. And if you have already installed WordPress in your domain & hosting then you need to provide me the login details of your WordPress as an administrator.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to start?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need you to provide me with your WordPress login information.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do You Provide Premium Themes and Plugins?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, On my Premium Package I provide all required premium themes and plugins.

packageList.title: BASIC PACKAGE
packageList.description: Wordpress, LearnDash plugin,Install a theme that supports LearnDash.

packageList.title: STANDARD PACKAGE
packageList.description: LMS website functions only: Students Panel + Payment Gateway + registration, login

packageList.description: Pro LMS website + instructor & Student Panel + certificate + membership + Security and more

reviews.comment: I am impressed with his great website development skills; his professionalism and ability to exceed expectations. Working with him was a breezehis proactive communication, quick responsiveness, and deep understanding of the project made everything seamless. Highly recommend Hafiz for anyone in need of top-tier web design!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your generous tip and kind review! Your support truly made my day, I really appreciate it!

reviews.comment: Hafiz Hassan is a fantastic website developer! His work was flawless, with incredible attention to detail, and he truly went above and beyond expectations. Plus, his proactive communication and flexibility made the whole process smooth and enjoyablehighly recommend!

seller_response.comment: Thank you very much for your nice words and Tips!!!

reviews.comment: Hasan literally went above and beyond to help me with my project! I will definitely order again and come back for second phase of the project .
